text: Haca hashika abari murugendo kuri rya riba, barungika umuvomyi w’amazi wabo, nawe aca yibiza indobo yiwe muri ryariba ry’amazi adugije yandobo aza abona umwana aca avuga ati:- ehe! n’akanyamuneza keza k’uyu musore w’umuhungu nabo baca baramunyegeza bavuga yuko baronse mubidandazwa baguze, n’Imana ikaba yari ifise ubumenyi bw’ivyo bahora bagira vyose
